responses: Hey! Welcome to PTCL KnowledgeBase. How can I help you?
I am the PTCL T&D ChatBot developed by the AI Research Team. I can help you in PTCL Product related queries to help you answer and guide customers
Goodbye Sir! if you have any other query, feel free to ask again!
Thank you Sir! Glad to provide you our services. Do you have any other query sir?

patterns: i want to ask a query
responses: I would be delighted to help, what is your query sir?
I am fine, Thank you for asking. Do you have any query?

patterns: i want to ask a query
responses: I am happy to solve your query, what is your query sir?

Sorry Sir, I am unable to understand your query. Maybe try rephrasing it?

If you are unable to find your required information then share your feedback at v.Umairismail@ptclgroup.com
external_link: If your query still can't be answered, it means it hasn't been added in my memory bank yet.

responses: Please ask queries related to PTCL Information and Products

patterns: Is there any way to check my bill online
How can I check my bill online
Any way to check my bill online
Please help me to find my bill online
Kindly guide me how can I view my bill online
how i can view my bill
responses:
Customers can find their bill online through bill portal by entering your PTCL PSTN Number and billing ID (given on any of your previous bill).

Moreover, you can access your billing details through PTCL’s Touch app and PTCL Official Webiste.

patterns: How much do I need to pay to get my services installed

responses: For copper connection, Installation charges are Rs.3500 and GPON/Flash Fiber charges are Rs.5000.

responses:
FUP for less than 20Mbps Packages

 

  • Usage Limit: 1 TB (1,000 GBs)
  • Additional Volume Bucket: 100 GBs for Rs.200
  • Additional Buckets Allowed: 15
  • Maximum Additional ChargesRs.3,000
  • Maximum Ceiling Limit: 15 buckets/1500 GBs

FUP for 20Mbps & Above Packages

 

  • Usage Limit: 2 TB (2,000 GBs)
  • Additional Volume Bucket: 100 GBs for Rs.200
  • Additional Buckets Allowed: 25
  • Maximum Additional Charges Rs.5,000
  • Maximum Ceiling Limit: 25 buckets/2500 GBs

How to Change Wifi modem customer is facing coverage/WiFi signal range issue then

  • Guide customer to use within 20 meters radius
  • In open spaces and away from wallsIf still extension in the range is required
  • Provide information of WiFi extenders like TPLink & DLink If facing any technical issue then after troubleshooting/probing Create below SR in CRM
  • For GPON ONT: GPON Technical > GPON > ONT OFF ONT/Adapter Faulty
  • For WiFi Modem: Broadband Technical > Broadband > Modem OFF CPE/Adapter Faulty

  • Ask customer if he is facing issue regularly or only currently at this time
  • If regularly then check device Abnormal Behavior
  • Restart the deviceIf issue not resolved then
  • Ask from customer if he is getting No Signal in All Locations or in specific Location

EVO/Charji No Browsing:Ask Customer if he is getting No browsing on specific website.

  • Check from Heat Maps if user is in our coverage area
  • Check the signal status
  • Check Device status
  • Device Abnormal Behavior

EVO/Charji Balance Lost

  • Verify the MDN from customer thought CNIC or ICCID
  • Must cross verify the MDN through ICCID to check same device SIM is used by customer or not.
  • Check Profile on EVO AAA
  • If customer complaining that unable to use EVO/CHARJI after recharge of amount then check current balance in PCRM & OCS through Query Cash Recharge Log

responses:
Bill installment - If Number Status is Active

•Check the payment history of the customer From RMS
•If customer paid partial bill in last Six Months 
•Offer only Two Installments

Bill installment - If Number Status is suspended

•If services are suspended due to non-payment and customer also wants to restore his services then
•First installment should be of at least 50%
•The balance amount can be divided in upto three installments

•Services will be auto-restored once payment of first installment is received in system
If Customer Call from Other CLI to get CDR by email then request the customer to call from same number against which CDR is required.

CDR Required By Post

•CCR will verify that customer is calling from same CLI.

Charji warranty covers:

responses:
Abbreviated Dialing

Now you can register up to 10 numbers to be associated with a single-digit number. Simply dial that digit to get the desired number.
 
Activation code
*51*Key Digit*num#
e.g. *51*1*0212254155#
Deactivation code:
#51#
Activation Procedure
On Call
Charges
Rs.55/Month
 
Customer need to dial **
at the start to dial a specific number
(e.g. **1, **2, **3)
external_link: Click here for more info

responses:
Call Forwarding/Transfer Immediate


All incoming calls will be transferred to another predefined number.


• Activation code:  
    *21*T/NO#
  e.g.  *09*0212254155#
• Deactivation code:  
    #21#
• Activation Procedure
   “On Call”
   Charges=Free
external_link: Click here for more info

responses:
Call Transfer -Busy Mode Mode


If you are too busy to answer the phone; the incoming call will be transferred automatically to another predefined number.

• Activation code:  
    *09*T/NO#
  e.g.  *09*0212254155#
• Deactivation code:  
    #09#
• Activation Procedure
   “On Call”
   Charges=Free
external_link: Click here for more information

responses:
Call Transfer (No Reply)

 

When you are unable to pick up the call, use this service to automatically transfer the call to another predefined number.

• Activation code:  
    *06*T/NO#
  e.g.  *09*0212254155#
• Deactivation code:  
    #06#
• Activation Procedure
   “On Call”
   Charges= Free

responses:
Conference Call

 

•With PTCL’s Conference Call Service, you can get unlimited automated conference calls which are available 24/7 and you won’t have to reschedule.
•You can merge two separate calls into a conference call.

 

If a customer wants to confirm about Call conference services then please check his/her number status via CRM.

• IF services are not activated then please activate call conference services Via CRM.
• (Firstly query the number then go to change value added and then activate Call Conference)
external_link: Click here for more information

responses:
Caller Line Identification (CLI)

Now you can avoid prank and spam calls, by knowing a caller’s number through PTCL CLI service.

If customer wants to confirm about CLI services then 
Check his/her number status via CRM.

---------------------------------------

•If services are not activated then activate CLI services Via CRM.
(Firstly query the number then go to change value added and then activate CLI)

•If services already activate then probe to the customer about telephone set & line distortion.
•If line clear & customer check telephone set then log a complaint in CRM.

Note: TAT of activation would be 24 hours

responses: Click on below buttons to get details of PSTN complaints.

PSTN No Dial Tone Complaint

 

•Ask/verify problematic Number
•Check number status in Installed Services (should be active)
•Ask customer to check dial tone
•Ask customer to check phone set and wire connection

PSTN Busy Tone issue

 

•Ask/verify problematic Number
•Check number status in Installed Services (should be active)
•Ask customer to check phone set
•Ask customer if he is getting busy tone

PSTN Noise issue

 

•Ask/verify problematic Number
•Check number status in Installed Services (should be active)
•Ask customer to check phone set
•Ask customer to check splitter wire connection

PSTN Call Drop issue

 

•Ask/verify problematic Number
•Check number status in Installed Services (should be active)
•Ask customer to check wire connection

PSTN Cross Talk issue

 

•Ask/verify problematic Number
•Check number status in Installed Services (should be active)
•Ask customer to check phone set
•Ask customer if he hears someone else voice during call

PTCL is providing Wireless Home-Fi services (as a pilot project) to their Islamabad/Rawalpindi customers where our Wireline (xDSL) services are not feasible.

Product details and Handling:

 

  • Wireless Home-Fi Services comes with 4Mbps speed and Unlimited downloading
  • Home-Fi installation charges are Rs.3500 (One Time Cost) and Monthly bill is Rs.2000 (Inclusive of taxes)
  • Home-Fi will be provided to only those customers of Islamabad/Rawalpindi where our Wireline (xDSL) services are not feasible

intents.tag: 80% Discounted STB Offer for Flash Fiber Customers
patterns: 80% Discounted STB Offer for Flash Fiber Customers
responses:
"80% Discounted STB Offer for Flash Fiber Customers"

 

A new 80% Discounted STB Offer for Flash Fiber customers is going to be launched from January 27th 2022, The campaign will be available for regions (ITR & LTR-S) for Flash Fiber customers only.

 

Brief:

  1. Offering Smart TV STB with 80% discount at a discounted price of PKR 1200
  2. Offer is for Flash Fiber customers ONLY

Offer valid for;

  • New Triple Play Orders
  • Double Play to Triple Play conversion
  • xDSL to Flash Fiber Conversion
